Vipaccatā，（f．） at Vin．II，88 is perhaps a der．fr．vi+vac，and not pac，thus representing a Sk．*vivācyatā，meȧning “challenging in disputation，” quarrelsomeness，provocation．See also vipāceti．If fr．vi+pac，the meaning would be something like “heatedness，exasperation．” （Page 626）

vipaccatā：ဝိပစ္စတာ （ဣ）
စိတ်၏ပင်ပန်းခြင်း။
